name: Nitroglycerin
skill: Deals 1948/2388 DMG to further enemies, with a high chance of inflicting Burn.

additional_data.description: The spirit of everyone's favorite explosive powder. She's certainly a formidable foe in battle, but she tends to scare people with her words more than anything else. She has this crazy theory that as long as she warns people in advance, she can't be blamed for any damage caused by a bombing. So she goes around joking about setting off bombs all the time, and no one ever knows if she's for real or not...
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 15/02/2017.
◦ Originally her sprite was depicted with a hat that had a hand on top of it.

main: "Be more careful? But everything happens so fast during an explosion!"
summon: "Hey, so you're my new master? Awesome!"
limit_break: "Whoa, I feel like I'm about to explode!"
